title: The Gallery Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, British, English
description: Situated near the Museum of Childhood in Bethnal Green, a social enterprise of St. Margaret's House. All food is vegan with vegetarian options, including pizza with vegan cheese. Also hosts a program of live events, a new art exhibition from an up-and-coming artist every month, live music nights, film screenings, comedy, and spoken word events throughout the year.
